column5: Nice job Rick, thanks man.
Very well done Rick  MTP

Well after three tries now I ve only been able to download half of it   I will try one more time tonight and if that doesn't work might get my brother or someone to download it for me and burn it.  What I have seen so far is great and i love the music choice....who is it?  Maureen
http://www.sevennations.com/  And that's a pretty snazzy website too.  I'd give it an award.
That isn't the site I did for them. I did their fan site which is http://www.7nfan.com Their fans know the band as 7N.
nicely done!

Ok, after a few tries I finally managed to download it...had to do it while I was at work...seems i don't sleep long enough   As expected it was awesome Rick...I will be burning it for sure so I don't lose it.... Thanks for taking the time to put it all together.  Maureen

THANKS! for putting that together Rick ! Seems like it was just yesterday......  That gives those that didn't attend a real feel for what they missed....everyone with smiles, enjoying the occassion, brought together by this message board.... Something that would never have happened less than even 10 years ago.

I got some new movie software, so I was using stills and songs to practice cutting sound tracks and doing video fades and stuff. Anyway, decided to use the time to make a Lakair Movie.   I hope you like...not sure about how long it will take to load.  HD version now available.. download by right-clicking and select 'Save link as' or 'Save target as' File size 29 MB  http://www.tmf.ca/lakair.wmv Should be finished uploading by 8:45 PM.
WOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOOOO   Good stuff Rick! Thanks for putting it together. Great job!
Cool video.  Loved the shot of GCD and his slab pickerel.  Looks like a great trip.  Corn Nug
Awesome..  have to play that next year... get everybody reved up!!
Damn dial up   :wallbash:  Maureen
lol Great Video!
Nice vid and good choice of music  I think you might have a future in this computer thinggy stuff.   Art
Awesome Rick...  Thanks for putting that together and sharing it...  I'll have more pic's up for you soon....I hope..
That was a video of epic proportions Rick!!!  I am both honored and proud to be a part of this thing we call OFC.!!!
Great job Rick. Thanks
Nice work Rick!  Thanks for putting that together...any chance you can make a hi res version available for download so I can burn it on a DVD?  MPEG4 should be fine.  Thanks!
Great flic Rick !!!!
HD link now in original post!
Good job Rick,I think you captured the moment pretty well there bud,cept for that photoshopped pic of Dawg and his prized Mackeral or whatever that fish was.. Joe
very nice Rick,tks for sharing
well done Rick
Nice job, Richard.  The soundtrack sounds like pike music to me.  Bagpipes make em crazy, I remember.
But Karla Harmonica makes them dead....

Are ya thirsty Joe?  Can I pour you a nice tall glass of stifle???  Don't worry Bubba, I'll take ya out next year and learn ya how to catch them wascally ol' Wall-ices!!!  btw... ya did catch that nice sized Tadpole!
Was going to down load it but the link for HD doesn't work?  I just get a blank page....any thoughts?  Maureen
Right click, Mo. 'Save Link As'.
Thanks Rick, tried to download it, only got about a third of it...will try again tonight when I go to bed.  Maureen

Thanks for putting that together Rick.  Although I couldn't make it again this year, the short clip certainly highlights the good times everyone had.  I just may be able to be a part of it next year...
C'mon Tony....you can do'er..2008 extravaganza is the weekend of the 21st. Book it NOW! Let us know please.
Awesome stuff Rick, you really captured our Lakair trip !!
